attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: The ranger who travels with me is a beloved companion for whom I would gladly give my life

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCVbfoz7u7z0XEhUe4N_description
attribs.current: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCVblMXMg8IWvrQiMZk_description
attribs.current: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I stay on alert so others can rest

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: My idea of hello is a flurry of licks to the face.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCVhcjvFjRTAPXoZ22N_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LDeknmV0MTC9P2Yvjtu_itemcontent
attribs.current: You have a +1 bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LDeknmV0MTC9P2Yvjtu_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Light Armor, AC: 12, Ac +1

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LESQbJYPjZffmDvtjQc_itemcontent
attribs.current: While in this saddle on a mount, you can't be dismounted against your will if you're conscious, and attack rolls against the mount have disadvantage.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LFPkKy6Zj0mPz9T-QfU_itemcontent
attribs.current:
The jewels in the insignia of the Cult of the Dragon flare with purple light when you enter combat, empowering your natural fists or natural weapons.

While wearing the insignia you gain a +1 bonus to the attack rolls and the damage rolls you make with unarmed strikes and natural weapons. Such attacks are considered to be magical.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LIYmcq3JyNolB2dvYBk_description
attribs.current: Ashina has had the Awaken spell cast on her.
